To create an AI-based toolset for content creation, you will need to consider the following resources:

1. Development resources: You will need a team of developers with the technical skills and expertise needed to build the AI-based toolset. This may include machine learning engineers, data scientists, and software developers with expertise in building AI-based systems.
2. Data and training resources: You will need a large dataset of content to train and validate your AI system. This may include abstract shapes, alphabet characters, real-world objects, music, and other audio content. You may need to create this data yourself, or purchase it from a third party.
3. Hardware resources: Depending on the complexity of your AI system, you may need to allocate resources for hardware such as servers, GPUs, or other specialized hardware.
4. Testing and quality assurance: You will need to allocate resources to test and validate the AI-based toolset to ensure it meets your quality standards and performs as expected. This may include a testing team or an individual with expertise in AI testing.
5. Marketing and sales: You will need to consider the resources needed to reach and sell to your target customers, including any marketing or sales materials that will be required. This may include a marketing team or individual with expertise in AI-based tools marketing.
6. Customer support: Depending on the complexity of your AI-based toolset, you may need to allocate resources to provide customer support and troubleshooting assistance to users. This may include a customer support team or individual with expertise in AI-based tools support.

I hope this information is helpful! Let me know if you have any other questions about the resources needed to create an AI-based toolset for content creation.

There are ready-to-be-used text-to-video AI models. They generate poor video in terms of realistically looking things, but they are absolutely brilliant when generating simple things like we need.

Text-to-video AI models can be useful for generating simple video content such as abstract shapes, alphabet characters, and other basic graphics. These models are typically not as advanced as more complex models that are designed to generate more realistic video content, but they can be a cost-effective way to generate basic video content quickly and efficiently.

To use a text-to-video AI model to generate content for your mobile app, you will need to consider the following resources:

1. AI model: You will need to select an appropriate text-to-video AI model for your needs. There are several commercial and open source models available, so you will need to research and compare options to find the best fit for your requirements.
2. Development resources: You will need a team of developers with the technical skills and expertise needed to integrate the text-to-video AI model into your toolset. This may include machine learning engineers, data scientists, and software developers with expertise in building AI-based systems.
3. Data and training resources: You may need to provide data to the text-to-video AI model in order to train it or fine-tune its output. This may include text descriptions of the video content you want to generate, as well as any other relevant data.
4. Hardware resources: Depending on the complexity of your AI system, you may need to allocate resources for hardware such as servers, GPUs, or other specialized hardware.
5. Testing and quality assurance: You will need to allocate resources to test and validate the AI-based toolset to ensure it meets your quality standards and performs as expected. This may include a testing team or an individual with expertise in AI testing.
6. Marketing and sales: You will need to consider the resources needed to reach and sell to your target customers, including any marketing or sales materials that will be required. This may include a marketing team or individual with expertise in AI-based tools marketing.
7. Customer support: Depending on the complexity of your AI-based toolset, you may need to allocate resources to provide customer support and troubleshooting assistance to users. This may include a customer support team or individual with expertise in AI-based tools support.

I hope this information is helpful! Let me know if you have any other questions about the resources needed to create an AI-based toolset using a text-to-video model.
So, we will need one UI/UX designer, one mobile app developer, one AI engineer.

To create a mobile app that integrates with an AI-based toolset for content creation, you will likely need the following resources:

1. UI/UX designer: A UI/UX designer will be responsible for creating the user interface and user experience of the mobile app. They will work with the development team to design the layout and flow of the app, as well as the look and feel of the user interface.
2. Mobile app developer: A mobile app developer will be responsible for building the mobile app and integrating it with the AI-based toolset. They will need expertise in the platform(s) you are targeting (e.g. iOS, Android), as well as experience in integrating mobile apps with AI-based systems.
3. AI engineer: An AI engineer will be responsible for building and maintaining the AI-based toolset. They will need expertise in machine learning, data science, and AI-based systems development.

Depending on the complexity of your project, you may also need additional resources such as testers, marketing and sales staff, and customer support staff.

I hope this information is helpful! Let me know if you have any other questions about the resources needed to create a mobile app that integrates with an AI-based toolset for content creation.
UX/UI guy will cost us about $1K per month

The cost of hiring a UI/UX designer can vary depending on the designer's level of experience, skills, and location. In general, you can expect to pay more for a designer with more experience and specialized skills. In Eastern Europe, the cost of hiring a UI/UX designer may be lower compared to other regions, but this will depend on the specific market and job market in the region.

It is difficult for me to provide a more specific estimate for the cost of hiring a UI/UX designer in Eastern Europe, as there are many variables that can affect the cost. Some factors to consider when determining the budget for a UI/UX designer include:

1. The designer's level of experience: More experienced designers may command higher rates due to their expertise and track record.
2. The complexity of the project: If your project is more complex or requires specialized skills, you may need to pay more for a designer with the necessary expertise.
3. The duration of the project: The cost of hiring a UI/UX designer may be higher if the project is longer in duration, as the designer will be working on the project for an extended period of time.
4. The location of the designer: The cost of living in different regions can affect the rates that designers charge. In general, you may pay more for a designer located in a region with a higher cost of living.

I hope this information is helpful! Let me know if you have any other questions about the cost of hiring a UI/UX designer in Eastern Europe.
